statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_trends WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_trends WHERE qr_code_scanned = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_trends WHERE payment_method = 'Cash' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_trends GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_trends WHERE payment_method = 'credit_card' AND qr_code_scanned = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_trends;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transaction_trends GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_code_string FROM qr_codes WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_code_string, expiration_date FROM qr_codes WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY qr_code_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_code_string, expiration_date FROM qr_codes WHERE qr_code_string LIKE '%ABCD%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_data WHERE vendor_id = 100;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendor_data ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendor_data ORDER BY vendor_rating DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, vendor_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_data GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING total_transactions > 5
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.product_name, pm.amount FROM products p JOIN payments pm ON p.product_id = pm.payment_id WHERE pm.amount > 100 ORDER BY pm.amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, p.product_name FROM users u, transactions t, products p WHERE u.user_id = t.user_id AND t.transaction_id = p.product_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM qr_code WHERE qr_code_type = 'static' ORDER BY qr_code_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, transaction_id, customer_id, qr_code_id, payment_method_id FROM transaction_analysis WHERE analysis_result->>'status' = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM transaction_analysis WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM qr_code WHERE qr_code_type = 'dynamic' ORDER BY qr_code_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_method WHERE payment_method_type LIKE '%card%' AND LENGTH(payment_method_description) > 100;
